00028 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;
00029 
00030 /*! Test Fixture for testing the Array File Reader. */
00031 class FusionArrayFileReaderTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture  
00032 {
00033         CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( FusionArrayFileReaderTest );
00034 
00035         CPPUNIT_TEST ( testCreation );
00036         CPPUNIT_TEST ( testmethod_Read_invalid_file );
00037         CPPUNIT_TEST ( testmethod_Read_missing_file );
00038         CPPUNIT_TEST ( testmethod_Read_calvin_array_file );
00039         CPPUNIT_TEST ( testmethod_Read_dtt_array_file );
00040         CPPUNIT_TEST ( testmethod_Read_mas_array_file );
00041 
00042         CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00043 
00044 public:
00045         void setUp();
00046         void tearDown();
00047 
00048         /*! Test the ability to create the ArrayFileReader class. */
00049         void testCreation();
00050         /*! Test the handling of attempting to read an invalid array file. */
00051         void testmethod_Read_invalid_file();
00052         /*! Test the handling of attempting to read an array file that does not exist. */
00053         void testmethod_Read_missing_file();
00054         /*! Test the ability to read a valid Calvin array file. */
00055         void testmethod_Read_calvin_array_file();
00056         /*! Test the ability to read an Data Transfer Tool formated array file. */
00057         void testmethod_Read_dtt_array_file();
00058         /*! Test the ability to read an Micro Array Suit formated array file (EXP).  */
00059         void testmethod_Read_mas_array_file();
00060 };
